Plot: Western frontiers of the USSR, 1942. The region is under German occupation. A man is wrongly accused of collaboration. Desperate to save his dignity, he faces impossible moral choice.
Title: In the Fog
Actors: Vladimir Svirskiy, Vladislav Abashin, Sergey Kolesov, Nikita Peremotov
tomatoConsensus: While it treads familiar narrative ground -- and is a mite predictable at times -- In the Fog proves a smart, thought-provoking antidote to Hollywood action movies.
